name: Exponential Digital Solutions
description:
10xDS is a new age organization wherein traditional consulting converges with digital technologies and innovative solutions helping businesses to be cognizant, to conceptualize and to convert. With its varied spread of professionals representing pan-industry insights, 10xDS is committed towards partnering with clients to augment their performances and help them realize their most important goals through a blend of automation, analytics, AI, digital solutions and ever increasing disruptive evolutions.
 10XDS is making change happen for its partners by identifying their business issues and transforming these into solutions, allowing them to focus on growth or other cost control opportunities. 10xDS attains this by using a few of the marketplace and workplace trends in digital and innovative solutions.
business_objectives: Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Headline: Driving Digital Transformations around the globe - Automation, Analytics, AI & Cybersecurity #WeAreExponential
ShortDescription: 10xDS is a new age organization wherein traditional consulting converges with digital technologies and innovative solutions helping businesses to be cognizant, to conceptualize and to convert.
enhanced_description: Exponential Digital Solutions (10xDS) is a new-age organization that seamlessly integrates traditional consulting methodologies with advanced digital technologies and innovative solutions. As a global digital transformation driver, 10xDS assists businesses in becoming cognizant, conceptualizing strategies, and converting them into tangible results. They leverage a blend of Robotic Process Automation (RPA), Artificial Intelligence (AI), analytics, and comprehensive digital strategy consulting to identify and resolve business issues. With professionals offering pan-industry insights, 10xDS partners with clients to augment their performance, achieve critical goals, and empower them to focus on growth or cost control opportunities. A key area of their expertise includes supporting organizations in building a more diverse and inclusive workforce.
key_use_cases: Developing and deploying Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions
Identifying and transforming business issues into actionable solutions
Enabling focus on business growth opportunities
Facilitating cost control through digital solutions
Building and fostering a diverse and inclusive workforce
competitive_advantages: Convergence of traditional consulting with new-age digital technologies and innovative solutions
Leveraging pan-industry insights through a varied spread of professionals
Commitment to partnering with clients to augment performance and achieve goals
Focus on disruptive evolutions and marketplace/workplace digital trends
Ability to identify and transform business issues into practical digital solutions
roi_benefits: Transformation of business issues into effective solutions
primary_users: Companies focused on business issue resolution
Companies aiming for growth or cost control
